infra_spec: Provision an AWS S3 bucket with versioning and default SSE-S3 encryption enabled
Create an AWS IAM role for EC2 with a policy allowing read-only access to S3
Build an AWS VPC (10.0.0.0/16) with one public and two private subnets across 2 AZs
Launch an AWS RDS PostgreSQL instance in Multi-AZ with automated backups retained for 7 days
Deploy an AWS Application Load Balancer fronting an Auto Scaling Group of EC2 instances
Configure autoscale on a VM Scale Set based on average CPU thresholds
Create a Disk Encryption Set backed by a customer-managed key in Key Vault
Provision a managed disk encrypted with a Disk Encryption Set and attach to a VM
Deploy a VM with boot diagnostics enabled to a storage account
Create an Availability Set with two fault domains and five update domains
Create a Proximity Placement Group and place a VM and VMSS in it for low latency
